comments.text:
Way to deface one of the great modern wonders of the world. What an 
asshole. That wasn't an underpass in that shit-hole city you're from, nor a 
box car en route to Hodunk, Oklahoma. The world is not your playground, 
fuckstick. I would've loved to see you get caught by Chinese police. If you 
think prison in Japan is bad... You're as bad as the fucking tourists who 
chisel off a piece of the Sphinx (which you would, no doubt, graffiti). No 
reverence for history. You art fags need to realize that hedonism is a good 
thing in moderation. The Great Wall will be around for another thousand 
years. You will be forgotten in less than a hundred. Only a fucking idiot 
jeopardizes a good a profitable career just to be moron. Next project: 
Hitch-hike through North Korea. Try punching one of those security guards 
in the face, tough guy. I'd pay to see the footage that follows.﻿
